Class com.chimu.form.database.support.DatabaseSupportPack 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----com.chimu.form.database.support.DatabaseSupportPack
public class DatabaseSupportPack
extends Object
DatabaseSupportPack contains database and mapping support functionality, and it especially provides constructors for the DatabaseOriented Generator classes.

Method Index

(s) newIntegerTable_row_column_block_Generator(Table, String, String, int)
Build a Generator that uses a TableRowGenerator with integer values [2^32] and checks out a block at a time.
(s) newIntegerTable_row_column_block_WithinTransactionGenerator(Table, String, String, int)
Build a Generator that uses a TableRowGenerator with integer values [2^32] and checks out a block at a time.
(s) newTable_row_column_coordinator_TransactionalGenerator(Table, Object, String, TransactionCoordinator)
Build a Generator that uses a table's row to generate the value

(s) prepareIntegerGenerator_block(GeneratorFromDatabase, int)
Prepare a GeneratorFromDatabase to use integer value generation and to fetch blocks of 'blockSize'
